posts.post_content:
I have the following T205's available for trade for the following needs:

T205's (Graded 3 or higher)
Walter Johnson
Ty Cobb
Addie Joss
Roger Bresnahan Open Mouth
Rube Marquard

Any hall of fame T206 2 or higher.

I have hi res front scans of all of these cards and there is quite a bit to post them in the thread but I'm happy to email them to you.

If you don't want to trade or have what I'm looking for in trade but would still like something on this list. I have included prices and will accept reasonable offers. Thanks.

$35 for the Carrigan sounds good as does the Stahl for 49.

Rawn
